description:
Beyond self defense, grappling and takedown techniques can add a dynamic element of rough body play to your physical BDSM play. MacDaddy demonstrates how you can take a person of any size down to the ground with little strength or effort--and do it safely.
Working on understanding points of balance in any stance and how to use the weakness in any stance, you can learn how anyone can be taken off their feet. Presented in a fun interactive way for all levels of fitness and experience, this tutorial provides a better understanding of breaking a person's balance, including break-falling for the safety and comfort for all. If you want to have fun playing rough in your BDSM play you will enjoy this video. No martial arts experience required. About the Presenter:
Before gender transition, MacDaddy was the highest ranking female martial artist in the world and has always worked to further women's rights. Mac is a world champion martial artist and former U.S. Karate team member. Mac has coached 58 national champions and 29 Junior Olympic champions. He is one of the highest ranking martial artists in the world and is a certified defensive tactics instructor for law enforcement professionals.
Check out the photo set for step-by-step images of all the moves, great for reference.
title: Grappling and Takedowns for BDSM Play
